philosophy.line1: I will not make videos just for views, but always aim to share practical values, helping you gain deeper understanding of the 5D worldview
philosophy.line2: and higher states of consciousness. We are all souls experiencing the life of a human being.

follow.text: Follow NiNa on TikTok, YouTube & Facebook to get daily horoscopes and meaningful messages.

oneIssue.title: One Tarot Issue
options: Duration: 20 to 30 minutes - 300,000 VND (4 questions with guidance)

monthlyTea: Tarot Reading + Monthly General Tea Leaf Reading:
futureSpouse: Future Husband or Wife Reading: 500,000 VND
unspokenFeelings: Their Deepest Unspoken Feelings for You:
careerDestiny: Which Career or Profession Aligns with Your Destiny and Fortune:
monthlyHighlight: Your Highlight of the Upcoming Month:

topics: What will your future spouse be like?
The deepest thoughts they never tell you.
A message from them after your last meeting.
How will your story with them end?
What does your future self want to tell you?
What do strangers think when they see you?
What are their true feelings for you?
What changes will happen in the next year? + Message included.
What do they truly want from you?
What do you bring into other people's lives?
If you and they officially start a relationship or reunite, what will happen?
Does your ex still miss you? What is their message for you?
Will what you are planning succeed?
Why are they avoiding you and not contacting you?
How do they feel about you and the third person?
